product_name: Deuter Futura Pro 34 SL Pack - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Deuter Futura Pro 34 SL Pack gets you out on the trail with an advanced suspension that offers lightweight, breathable comfort and load transfer. Slim-fitting, women-specific design has narrow short shoulder straps and a short torso length. Patented Aircomfort Pro suspension brings together topnotch ventilation, superb load transfer and a pivoting hipbelt. Contoured, padded shoulder straps are lined with airy mesh for quick-drying breathability. Padded Variflex hipbelt pivots at the center of your lower back, following your natural movement to help you keep your balance. Mesh ventilated back holds the pack body away from your back, promoting fresh airflow and reducing perspiration. Spring steel wire design combined with a horizontal stay effectively transfers load weight to your hips. Top-loading main compartment features zippered front access and a reservoir sleeve with a drink tube exit port that enables on-the-go hydration (reservoir not included). Front stash pocket, large bellowed side pockets and mesh side pockets help organize gear; separate zippered compartment for sleeping bag is accessible at the base of the pack. Top lid pocket holds your map, compass or GPS, spare batteries and other small equipment items; interior valuables pocket secures important items. Side compression straps cinch down loads for jostle-free carrying; attachment points allow you to lash trekking poles and ice tools to pack exterior. SOS label inside the lid includes information to help if you're lost or need assistance. The Deuter Futura Pro 34 SL Pack lets you easily protect its contents via an integrated, removable raincover. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Deuter Futura Pro 34 SL Pack gets you out on the trail with an advanced suspension that offers lightweight, breathable comfort and load transfer.
